title: Scam being conducted from the official email id of the Tamil Nadu Commercial Taxes Department
selftext:
So today I got this email from the official email id of [ctd.tn.gov.in](https://ctd.tn.gov.in) and out of curiosity (and some free time ðŸ˜œ) I replied to that email but I forgot to check that the reply to email id marked in the email is to that scammer's Gmail id. In reply to my "What?" email he replied with four paragraph essay of his.

I am waiting to get a reply from the scammer to the latest mail I sent him further investigating how to get the 4.9 million pounds that he is promising me he will share with me once I am established as the next of kin for Late Mrs. Laura S. Greg.

Please let me know whether any of you got such mail or encountered such scams from the official email ids. And whom should I notify or complaint to about this. 

P.S.: I've sent a mail to the Complaints/ Grievance Cell of the Commercial Taxes Department, Tamil Nadu and waiting for their reply. And I know what I am doing when it comes to such scams but the only mistake now I did is that I replied from my personal email id so that will be fun in the future.

[The first email is from the official Tamil Nadu Commercial Taxes Department email id](https://preview.redd.it/arwnjmlg9tga1.jpg?width=1440&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=6d2077e3ec430ce5f7a882d27093134f7454371d)

[This one is from a Gmail id](https://preview.redd.it/lmsnwps59tga1.jpg?width=1440&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=d279aa37910da27ada063bf43f9662b6661a3fca)
comments: Case of e-mail spoofing. Nothing official about that mail id.
Yeah, that is not the official email address of anyone. Just someone trying to be clever via email spoofing. It will not pass SPF, DKIM, or DMARC checks.

I remember, I got a scammed email from a lady that her husband died and she wants her money to someone worthy like me. 

I replied how her husband died, we exchanged 3-4 emails. It was funny.
Planning to the same thing. But that scammer hasn't replied to me yet ðŸ˜‚
